title: Patient Registration & Demographics
description: Personal details, emergency contacts, and insurance/syndicate information.

title: Medical & Dental History
description: Required health background, allergies, and medication list.

title: Notice of Privacy Practices & Data Consent
description: Acknowledgement of how your health data is stored, processed, and protected.

title: Financial Policy Agreement
description: Payment terms, insurance billing, and cancellation fee policies.

title: Authorization for Release of Records
description: Permission to share your files with family members or other providers.

title: Teledentistry & Electronic Communication
description: Consent to communicate via email/SMS and receive remote care.
